company_commercial_names: dripping colours | dripping colours day care centre | dripping colours montessoridripping | dripping colours montessori
short_description: dripping colours is a montessori school based in rawang, malaysia.
long_description: in this warmth, security, love and caring environment, we provide preschool and day care service in a dynamic and stimulating montessori learning environment. every material in a montessori classroom supports an aspect of child development, creating a match between the child's natural interests and the available activities. from the rich montessori learning environment, children are able to develop creative thinking, self esteem and communication skill. we adopt montessori method to all age group. these activities help children to discover and explore knowledge of the world and to develop their maximum potential. we believed that real life experiences bring positive impact to children's learning journey. a cooking class in a week with clear step-by-step guides and easy to cook recipe for all children promotes fun and experiential learning. instead of sitting, listening and writing in classroom, our children are exposed to activities such as role play, music and movement, storytelling etc in the afternoon session.

generated_description: dripping colours montessori is a preschool and daycare center located in kuala lumpur, malaysia. the institution focuses on the montessori method of learning, emphasizing child-led exploration, hands-on activities, and individualized instruction for children aged below 6. the center provides a creative and child-friendly environment with experienced teachers and age-appropriate activities designed to cultivate independence, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills. dripping colours montessori offers a variety of programs, including jolly phonics for reading and writing, cooking classes, multilingual learning, and enrichment activities such as art, craft, language, mathematics, science, and cultural events. the institution aims to prepare children for confident entry into primary school by fostering a love for learning and development in a supportive and nurturing environment.
